thread.title: Djokovic and Nadal mix tennis with politics on Thailand trip
thread.title_full: Djokovic and Nadal mix tennis with politics on Thailand trip

title: Djokovic and Nadal mix tennis with politics on Thailand trip
text:
> Top News Djokovic and Nadal mix tennis with politics on Thailand trip Spain's Rafael Nadal, who is in Bangkok for an exhibition game against world No. 1 Novak Djokovic, visits the Erawan Shrine in central Bangkok, Thailand, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015. A bomb exploded near Erawan Shrine on Aug. 17, killing 20 people and injuring more than 120. (AP Photo/Mark Baker) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
